item.description:
EVENT: Join your Mosaic friends on a two-hour hike through Great Brook Farm State Park in Carlisle. Wear sturdy shoes as the trails are sometimes rocky and uneven. Bring a daypack with food, water, raingear, a sweater, a hat and gloves.  The TC has a couple of extra daypacks if anyone needs to borrow one. The TC can provide an insider’s view of the park, having worked there as a park ranger for five years.  The excursion might include a visit to an ice cream stand, if it hasn’t closed for the season.

Trip’s Coordinator: Catherine Cantrell

MEET: 12:00 at the pavilion near the bathrooms on East Street entrance of the Park, off of Lowell st.

RSVP: This is a ``show-and-go’’ event, RSVP isn't needed. If you need a ride or can offer one, please rsvp to Trip Coordinator - Catherine Cantrell - backpackingranny@hotmail.com

COST: $5 that can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the pavilion near the bathrooms on East Street entrance of the Park

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Greatbook Farms Hike
